\fill[violet]
\foreach \row [count=\y] in \BITARRAY {
\foreach \cell [count=\x] in \row {
  \ifnum\cell=0 %
    (\x*\gridstep-\gridstep, -\y*\gridstep+\gridstep) rectangle ++(\gridstep, -\gridstep)
  \fi
  \pgfextra{%
    \global\let\maxx\x
    \global\let\maxy\y
    }%
  }
}
; % now we do the grid
\draw[thin] (0, 0) grid[step=\gridstep] (\maxx*\gridstep, -\maxy*\gridstep);
\foreach \x in {0,...,\km} { %loop stepping m times via km
   \pgfmathtruncatemacro{\mk}{\km-\x-1} 
   \draw (\x*\kwidth*\gridstep,0) -- (\x*\kwidth*\gridstep,\gridstep*\lineextstep); %top ticks
   \draw (\x*\kwidth*\gridstep,-\maxy*\gridstep) -- (\x*\kwidth*\gridstep,-\maxy*\gridstep-\gridstep); %bottom ticks
   \ifnum\x<\km
    \node[above] at(\x*\kwidth*\gridstep+\kwidth*\gridstep/2,0){\small \(X_{i+\mk}\)};
	\fi
}
\draw (0,0) -- (-\gridstep*\lineextstep,0);
\draw (0,-\maxy*\gridstep) -- (-\gridstep*\lineextstep,-\maxy*\gridstep);
\node at(-\gridstep*\lineextstep,-\gridstep*\lineextstep/2){\small 0};
\node at(-\gridstep*\lineextstep,-\maxy*\gridstep+\gridstep*\lineextstep/2){\small \numberofrounds};
\node[rotate=90] at(-\gridstep*\lineextstep,-\maxy*\gridstep/2){\small rounds};
%this creates the sidebar ticks
\foreach \itick in {0,...,\maxy}{
	 \pgfmathparse{int(mod((\itick-1),10))} 
	 \ifnum\pgfmathresult<1
	    \draw (0,-\itick*\gridstep) -- (-\gridstep*\lineextstep/3,-\itick*\gridstep);
	 \fi
}
